mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, user_id, password, nickname) VALUES (#{email}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(email = #{email}) AS emailCount, SUM(user_id = #{userId}) AS userIdCount, SUM(nickname = #{nickname}) AS nicknameCount FROM user
SELECT user_no AS userNo, password, nickname, user_id AS userId, profile_pic AS profilePic, first_login AS firstLogin, status_message AS userStatusMessage FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT u2.email, u2.nickname, u2.status_message AS userStatusMessage, u2.profile_pic AS profilePic FROM user u1 JOIN user u2 ON u1.user_no = #{signedUserNo} WHERE u2.user_no = #{targetUserNo};
